creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
Creating a new publication from the intro page doesn't work. Looks like it is
trying to do permission lookups on index.html as a publication.

org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.PublicationException: The publication
[index.html] does not exist.
	at
org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.PublicationManagerImpl.getPublication(PublicationManagerImpl.java:84)

while we're at it: why do we have a url-policy file for "index.html" in the
default pub? is that stale, or do we keep it for a reason?
creator: nettings@apache.org

text: Or what about admin/users/alice.html and admin/users/lenya.html?
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
rfrovarp@apache.org
text: #2 and #3 aren't needed fixed in r596869 and r596788
